Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee claim decision
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the board erred in failing to consider the totality of evidence regarding identity
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) Section 106
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Identity credibility challenged due to one counterfeit document
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Presence of one counterfeit document leading to rejection of all documents
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to assess authenticity of other documents despite one being counterfeit
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision set aside, case remitted to another RPD member
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Totality of evidence must be considered
Crimes.Application_Factor: Prevalence of forged Chinese documents cited as context
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to unverified identity
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Failure to conduct comprehensive credibility assessment
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Doubts about identity stemming from counterfeit RIC
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Overreliance on single fraudulent document; failure to verify others
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Deficient — failure to fairly assess all evidence
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Resident Information Card found to be counterfeit
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Global credibility undermined by one forged document without individual assessment
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant argued that other evidence should have been independently assessed
Crimes.Relevant_Law: IRPA, particularly sections relating to identity verification
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to verify remaining documents after identifying one as counterfeit

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee determination decision
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Issue: Failure to consider full evidentiary record
Crimes.Evidence_Disclosure_Status: All evidence submitted but not fully considered
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issue: Disregard of corroborative evidence due to one counterfeit item
Crimes.Procedural_Requirement: Obligation to assess all evidence related to identity
Crimes.Risk_Nexus: Potential link between undocumented entry and smuggling
Crimes.Outcome: Claim dismissed based on identity concerns
Crimes.Basis_for_Decision: Reliance on single counterfeit document invalidating overall identity claim
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility finding based solely on one forged document
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Issues: Failure to provide balanced assessment of identity evidence
Crimes.Basis_for_Inadmissibility: Inability to verify identity raising concerns under IRPA
Crimes.Accusation: Indirect implication of possible smuggling due to irregular entry and document issues
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Narrow focus on document fraud without broader contextual analysis
Crimes.Credibility_Findings: Identity deemed unreliable due to counterfeit RIC
Crimes.Risk_Persecution: Alleged fear of persecution related to religious activities
Crimes.Mode_of_Entry: Irregular (not explicitly stated but implied through documentation issues)
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did RPD err in assessing identity evidence?

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee claim refusal
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether RPD failed to consider all evidence in identity assessment
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Incomplete — focused only on counterfeit RIC
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to unresolved identity issues
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On claimant to establish identity and basis of claim
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Identity discredited due to one fraudulent document
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Claimants must provide acceptable ID or explanation under IRPA s. 106
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to holistically evaluate documentary and testimonial evidence
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution for participating in illegal religious activities in China
Crimes.Outcome_on_Merits: Not reached — claim dismissed on procedural/identity grounds
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Unfair — insufficient consideration of available evidence
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Argued that other documents and testimony supported identity
Crimes.Court_Result: Remitted for reassessment by different decision-maker
Crimes.Defendant_Response: RPD maintained that high rate of document fraud justified skepticism
Crimes.Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial review under Federal Courts Act
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
